text: Goodou gi dagatonu adu gi goodou bolo deai taane, be di ahina, di madahaanau, be di madawaawa i goodou ala e tuu i kinei dangi nei, e huli gi daha mo Dimaadua go tadau God, e daumaha gi nia god o nia henua ala i golo ai. Deenei la gaa hai be di aga dela e tomo gaa hai di laagau mmala ge honu poisin.29.18 Hebrews 12.15
